# GitHub Flavored Markdown

Read more: https://github.github.com/gfm/

### Autolink literals

www.example.com, https://example.com, and contact@example.com.

### Footnote

A note[^1]

[^1]: Big note.

### Strikethrough

~~two~~ tildes. (todo: one!)

### Table

| a | b  |  c |  d  |
| - | :- | -: | :-: |
| foo | bar | baz

## Tasklist

* [ ] to do
* [x] done
